alert.note: Alert for Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 8:28PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN WAYNE AND WESTERN OAKLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Milford to near Livonia. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livonia, Southfield, Pontiac, Novi, Milford, Canton, Birmingham, Northville, Clarkston, West Bloomfield, Westland, Farmington Hills, Wixom, Farmington, Beverly Hills, Plymouth, Walled Lake, Wolverine Lake, Bloomfield Hills, and Franklin. People attending Pine Knob Music Theatre should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 86 and 91. I-275 between mile markers 24 and 29. I-96 between mile markers 157 and 175. I-696 between mile markers 1 and 8. M-10 between mile markers 17 and 18. M-14 between mile markers 18 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
